EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please click on the link below for a useful document about starting school. For the first week of term, pre-nursery children will be starting on half day sessions only, to help with the settling in process. That means the day will finish at 11:30. Obviously every child is different, and depending on their needs we will look at each child individually to determine when they are ready to manage a full day of school, and all that it entails.
I hope you all have a wonderful summer, and I look forward to seeing you all in September. Please note that there is a meet the teacher day prior to that on August 28th.
Preparing to Start School (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xYU1HUlU4QnFFa0E/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards Natasha Daynes British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
